text: Syndromic obesity refers to a form of obesity occurring as part of a syndrome, often an intellectual disability. Known types of syndromic obesity include but not limited to: * Alstrom syndrome * Prader Willi syndrome * Bardet-Biedl syndrome * 16p11.2 deletion syndrome ==References== Category:Health Category:Biology Category:Obesity Category:Diseases Category:Disorders Category:Physiology Category:Health problems
title: Syndromic obesity
